title: Because I’ve Been Reincarnated As A Girl I Just Want To Do Yuri Things, But Things Aren’t Going Well - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Romance   Yuri
tags: Accelerated Growth   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Charismatic Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Domestic Affairs   Economics   Engagement   European Ambience   Fast Learner   Female Protagonist   Harsh Training   Loli   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male to Female   Merchants   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   Politics   Popular Love Interests   Reincarnated in Another World   Shoujo-Ai Subplot   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Tomboyish Female Lead   Younger Love Interests

description:
Yamada Haruka (♂), a man who loves anime and manga where girls are hanging out having fun and laughing, dies of overwork and before he knew it, he was reborn as a girl in a different world.

Haruka Yamada finds himself reborn as Flora, the only daughter of the Margrave family, House Carruthers, she was happy that she could be and enjoy time with other girls in this new life, but things aren’t working out too well for her. Will she be able to fully enjoy her life in another world?!>
